page.title: 07A DAY IN A SCHOOLGIRL'S LIFE
page.content: MORNING My name is Jennifer Giles and I am 10 years old. On Tuesdays I wake up at 0730 hours and practise the piano until 0800 hours. Then I get dressed and have breakfast. At 0845 hours I go to school and on the way we collect Louise, who is 5 years old with blonde hair and blue eyes. When we get there I walk round the playground with my best friend Amanda. The bell goes at 0855 hours so we have enough time to change our shoes and take our coats off before Assembly at 0900 hours. After that we have registration which takes about 5 minutes. Then we do English and Humanities lessons until playtime, which is from 1030 till 1045. Next we have Mathematics until lunchtime at 1200. Most people have school cooked lunch, but I have sandwiches.
